name: Quadra (itch)
description:
Quadra Physics based Tetris, made for the Ludum Dare #49

I'm not reeeeeally happy with this game, I think I could've done better in a lot of parts. Welp, I'm a bit rusty with game jams right now, so maybe I should just blame this 😅

I hope you enjoy playing!

Controls:
  • Arrow or WASD keys: move pieces;
  • X/C or J/K keys: rotate pieces;
  • P key: pause game;
  • M key: mute game.

Hold down or S to make pieces fall faster.

Credits:
  • Fonts: Nimble Beasts Collective, Daniel Linssen;
Palettes used:
  • Quadra;
  • Spark;
  • Nicole Punk 82;
  • Poison;
  • 5-Sheep;
  • Blessing;
  • Capp-5;
  • Ink;
  • Twilight-5;
  • Neo-5.
Software used:
  • Godot Engine v3.2.2 Stable Official;
  • JFXR;
  • Audacity 2.4.1;
  • Deflemask v0.12.1;
  • GIMP v2.10.20 rev1;
